channel.title: Need help! - Setting Skills
channel.description:
Hi, i'd like to know how to specifically set a players skill, you might not get what i'm saying but here's an example:
(Ingame)
The player types this command - ::setskill (the level you want the skill to be 1-99)
I'm familiar with adding commands, i'm just not sure what to put to actually make it set the skill!

item.title: Need help! - Setting Skills
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

No I specifically need the answer to it actually setting one, thanks for that help, but what if the person wants to make the skill 1? It’s a pking server where you control skills, and if someone makes a mistake or levels up on a pure, then they can’t ever get it back to 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! - Setting Skills
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

its usually addSkillXp(int skillId, int amount)

Read full topic
